page.title: 05COATES FARM,near PENICUIK
page.content: { } The farm is two miles from Penicuik.It is a{beef cattle}and{sheep}farm.It has{150 cows,4 bulls and 640 ewes.}The farmland is quite stoney and most of the land is for grazing.The farmer also grows some{barley(90acres),hay {(50acres)turnips(30acres) and {grass(silage)(150acres)}to feed his animals in the winter.The farmer told us that only{3 people}are needed to work on the farm.Twenty years ago there were{12 workers.}The farmer also 3 tractors and several other machines to help him.This year nearly{800 lambs and{140 calves}were born on the farm. There are also{6 Warren hens, a guinea {fowl,3 sheep dogs}and{between 10 to 12 {cats.
